name: Felid Dragon
description: The Felid Dragon has remarkable speed and agility, capable of both aerial and terrestrial combat. It has a sleek, agile body with sharp claws and a powerful bite.
memorable: Its ability to use a deafening roar and unleash a sickening bile attack makes encounters with this dragon particularly challenging.
goals: To dominate its territory and take down intruders using cunning ambush tactics.
relations: It could be encountered with other dragons, particularly creatures that rely on stealth and mobility.
environment: Typically found in mountainous or secluded, remote areas.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity score grants it high agility and evasiveness in combat. Also possesses magic resistance.
weaknesses: Although challenging, it may still rely on terrain and strategic positioning for maximum effectiveness in combat.
attacks: Makes three attacks in a single turn: a powerful bite and two punishing claw strikes, with additional debilitating effects.
most_powerful_ability: Sickening Bile attack can deal significant poison damage and impose the poisoned condition over a wide area.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, enhancing its ability to detect hidden foes.
skills: Excels in Stealth with a +16 proficiency, making it a master ambush predator.
additional_information: Immunities to poison damage and conditions such as being poisoned or prone.
Flyby ability prevents it from provoking opportunity attacks while flying.
Keen Smell grants advantage on Perception checks that rely on scent.
Pounce ability allows it to knock creatures prone with a successful claw attack, followed by a bite as a bonus action.
Deafening Roar can incapacitate multiple foes but allows saves to reduce the effect.
